enb_long_title: Tenth Subsidiary Body for Scientific and Technological Advice (SBSTA) and the Subsidiary Body for Implementation (SBI)
sentences: The LULUCF contact group met in the afternoon to consider draft conclusions negotiated in previous sessions and an informal meeting held the previous day.

The group cleared the final remaining bracketed text after accepting an EU proposal, amended by the US and the G-77/China, to note that an invitation to Parties to provide the Secretariat with guidance on the scope of a proposed workshop 'may include data, information and a decision-making framework.
' The group concluded its work, adopting the draft conclusions as amended.
